comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This is Ulrich Neckel, later 30-victory ace. He is in NCO uniform here, but later was promoted to Leutnant. He flew with Jastas 12, 13, 19, and 6. He later earned the Pour le Merite (aka Blue Max) and ended the war with 30 confirmed victories. He died of Tuberculosis some time after the war (1930s?)
